sentences.en: ‘Maybe you are right,’ she acknowledged.
sentences.cn: “也许你是对的。”她承认道。

sentences.en: And again, can you acknowledge it as true?
sentences.cn: 再者, 你会认为真有此事 吗 ?

sentences.en: Both defendants refused to acknowledge the authority of the court.
sentences.cn: 两名被告都拒绝承认法庭的权威性。

sentences.en: Claire acknowledged that she was guilty.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔承认有罪。

sentences.en: Doran stuck his head out of the window to acknowledge the cheering.
sentences.cn: 多兰将头探出窗户向欢呼的人们致谢。

sentences.en: Gradually he began to acknowledge his feelings of envy towards his mother.
sentences.cn: 渐渐地，他开始承认自己羡慕母亲。

sentences.en: He never even bothered to acknowledge her presence.
sentences.cn: 他甚至对她的在场未予理会.

sentences.en: He saw her but refused to even acknowledge her.
sentences.cn: 他看见了她，却连招呼也不打。

sentences.en: His cooking reflects a determination to acknowledge his northern roots.
sentences.cn: 他的烹饪风格表明他决心承认自己根在北方的坚定决心。

sentences.en: I allowed myself to acknowledge my true feelings.
sentences.cn: 我愿意承认我的真实感情。

sentences.en: I gratefully acknowledge financial support from several local businesses.
sentences.cn: 我对本地几家企业的资助表示感谢.

sentences.en: I hereby acknowledge receipt of your letter of 25 July.
sentences.cn: 特此告知贵方7月25日的来函收悉.

sentences.en: I would be grateful if you would acknowledge receipt of this letter.
sentences.cn: 收到此信后请告知，不胜感谢。

sentences.en: It is ungracious of me not to acknowledge your help.
sentences.cn: 你大力帮助而我尚未表示谢意,十分失礼.

sentences.en: Some of the clergy refused to acknowledge the new king'slegitimacy.
sentences.cn: 一部分神职人员拒绝承认新国王的合法地位。

sentences.en: The family acknowledge the need for change.
sentences.cn: 全家人都承认需要改变一下。

sentences.en: The government must acknowledge what is happening and do something about it.
sentences.cn: 对于目前的情况，政府必须承认其存在并对此采取措施。

sentences.en: This is a fact that most smokers readily acknowledge .
sentences.cn: 这是大多数烟民都愿意承认的事实。

sentences.en: We gratefully acknowledge the contributions of everyone who helped us.
sentences.cn: 我们衷心感谢每一位帮助我们的人所付出的努力.

sentences.en: We must acknowledge his letter.
sentences.cn: 我们应当告诉他信收到了.

sentences.en: We wish to acknowledge the support of the university.
sentences.cn: 我们想要感谢大学给予的支持。

sentences.en: With so much evidence against him he had to acknowledge his error.
sentences.cn: 在这么多的证据面前,他不得不承认错误.

sentences.en: You have to sign here and acknowledge receipt.
sentences.cn: 你得在这儿签名,表示已收到.

words.tran_cn: 承认；确认（acknowledge的过去式和过去分词）；答谢

trans.tran_cn: 承认，接受，感谢，理会，告知收到
trans.tran_en: to admit or accept that something is true or that a situation exists

trans.tran_cn: 确认收悉； 承认， 承认…的权威； 对…表示谢意； 报偿
trans.tran_en: to admit or accept that something is true or that a situation exists
